channel.title: Project-DS (distingtion server) v.6 [RECRUTING] Cache editing! more npcs than rs
channel.description:
[center]Welcome to project-DS v.6 making! hope you will all join my development and get a fast improved server i have a 3d modeling cd that my cousin lent me so we can make new models ext ext I will not be giving this cd out seems i aint gona send through the post :P
But cache editing i will get my hands on the unpacker again but il have to do more search for the repacker, lets see what we will be doing on v.6 Project-DS v.6 Starting place will be at yanille and will be adding alot more compatible with silab's and also our cache! will be runned almost 24/7 ~previous project's~ Most of my projects have went well i will hope this goes same way:P most players online was 70 but we had some lagg :P specs worked also godsword was working fine![/center]
Right lets move on now :P
~Testers~ -Sarah M (co-owner) -Skasms (mod) - - - -
Client coder's - - -
cache editers - - - Website makers (will be admin) -M00 M00 Pk - - -
that is all for now! thanks and hope you join
~zilch~ -
Pics [img]http://i193.photobucket.com/albums/z147/ownerhami/sc1.jpg[/img] [img]http://i193.photobucket.com/albums/z147/ownerhami/103.jpg[/img]
Some codes ive come up with
Added weponhandler to work perfect [code]//---Weapon-----Stand---Walk----Run----FightTy--Op1-----Op2-----Op3-----Op4---Block id = -1 -1 -1 -1 2 -1 423 -1 -1 -1 //Unarmed id = 4718 2065 2064 -1 2 2067 2066 -1 -1 1666 //Dharoks Greataxe id = 7807 2065 2064 -1 0 -1 -1 -1 -1 -1 //Anger Battleaxe id = 7158 2065 2064 -1 4 406 407 406 406 410 //Dragon 2H Sword[/code]
[code]import java.io.*;
public class WeaponHandler {
public static int SA = 808; public static int WA = 819; public static int RA = 824; public static int AA = 422; public static int BA = 1834; public static int StandAn; public static int WalkAn; public static int RunAn; public static int AttackAn; public static int BlockAn; public static int AttackOption;
public WeaponHandler() { System.out.println("WeaponHandler \251Mr. Brightsite"); }[/code]

item.dc:creator: @Aff Aff
item.description:
@Aff wrote:

[quote=“zilchuary, post:4, topic:152646”][quote author=Aff link=topic=208829.msg1831556#msg1831556 date=1192835489]
Good luck - I’d join, but as you should know, all I’m good at is being active on forums.

Anyways, if I were you I’d edit your post from “Silab Cache” to “471 Cache” because it’s not called a silab cache just because she gave it a lot of 471 items.
[/quote]

You know what people are like
i now its 471 items
but people now as silabs cache
if i said “471 items” thayd talk to me stupid.[/quote]

Four words.

Then they are retards.

Read full topic

@zilchuary wrote:

[center]Welcome to project-DS v.6 making!
hope you will all join my development and get a fast improved server
i have a 3d modeling cd that my cousin lent me so we can make new models ext ext
I will not be giving this cd out seems i aint gona send through the post

But cache editing i will get my hands on the unpacker again but il have to do more search for the repacker, lets see what we will be doing on v.6
Project-DS v.6
Starting place will be at yanille and will be adding alot more
compatible with silab’s and also our cache!
will be runned almost 24/7
~previous project’s~
Most of my projects have went well
i will hope this goes same way:P
most players online was 70 but we had some lagg
specs worked also godsword was working fine![/center]

Right lets move on now

~Testers~
-Sarah M (co-owner)
-Skasms (mod)

Client coder’s

cache editers

Website makers (will be admin)
-M00 M00 Pk

that is all for now!
thanks and hope you join

~zilch~

Pics

Some codes ive come up with

Added weponhandler to work perfect

//---Weapon-----Stand---Walk----Run----FightTy--Op1-----Op2-----Op3-----Op4---Block id = -1 -1 -1 -1 2 -1 423 -1 -1 -1 //Unarmed id = 4718 2065 2064 -1 2 2067 2066 -1 -1 1666 //Dharoks Greataxe id = 7807 2065 2064 -1 0 -1 -1 -1 -1 -1 //Anger Battleaxe id = 7158 2065 2064 -1 4 406 407 406 406 410 //Dragon 2H Sword

[code]import java.io.*;

public class WeaponHandler
{

public static int SA = 808;
public static int WA = 819;
public static int RA = 824;
public static int AA = 422;
public static int BA = 1834;
public static int StandAn;
public static int WalkAn;
public static int RunAn;
public static int AttackAn;
public static int BlockAn;
public static int AttackOption;

public WeaponHandler()
{
    System.out.println("WeaponHandler \251Mr. Brightsite");
}[/code]
